item.title: What to know about after-Christmas sales from Amazon, Walmart and more
item.description: Bargain hunters are busy amid seasonal discounts and "going out of business" sales by at least two retailing chains.

item.title: Behind Trump's latest comments on Canada, the Panama Canal and Biden

item.title: Jennifer Crumbley requests to be released from prison pending appeal

item.title: "Baby Driver" actor Hudson Meek, 16, dies after falling from a moving vehicle
item.description: Hudson Meek, the 16-year-old actor known for his performance in the 2017 film "Baby Driver," died Dec. 21 in Alabama, authorities said.

item.title: Biden heads to St. Croix for final holiday as president
item.description: President Biden's final holiday in office will take place largely out of the public eye.
